name: Nightmare Castle (Gabriel Alonso)
description:
In this game, you are Godrick, an archaelogist and also a treasure hunter. After hearding rumours that que rarest treasure is hidden in a haunted castle, Godrick goes to that castle thinking that the haunted thing was just a lie. But he didn't expect that it was actually true.

Controls:

Z/J: Jump.

X/K: Attack.

C/L: Throw axes.

S/I: Backdash.

Arrows/A-D: Move.

developed with Construct 2.
